actions.Passwords not matching: Current and new passwords are different
actions.Connect Airbnb Message: Please do connect igloohome to Airbnb primary host's account not co-host's account.
actions.FingerPrint Message: Quick login with fingerprint. Alternatively, you may set up later under 'Account Settings'.
actions.Touch Id Message: Quick login with Touch ID. Alternatively, you may set up later under 'Account Settings'.
actions.Face Id Message: Quick login with Face ID. Alternatively, you may set up later under 'Account Settings'.
Press back again to exit App.

pairing.Step 1: Place palm over keypad to activate lock.
pairing.Step 1 padlock: Press any number to activate lock.
pairing.Step 1 euroRetrofit: Please keep the lock unlocked and hold the multi-function button until the lock is flashing blue.
pairing.Step 1 keybox: Please keep the lock open and place palm over keypad to activate the lock
pairing.Keybox warning: Please do not shut the keybox until it has been paired.
pairing.Scan: Select the bluetooth lock to connect to.
pairing.PAIRING_STEP_1: Remove the back panel of the lock
pairing.PAIRING_STEP_2: Place palm over keypad to activate lock
pairing.PAIRING_STEP_2_KEYBOX: Please keep the lock open and place palm over keypad to activate the lock
pairing.PAIRING_STEP_4_L: Press and hold unlock key for 2 seconds
pairing.PAIRING_STEP_4_B: Press and hold # key for 2 seconds
pairing.PAIRING_STEP_5_L: Listen out for 4 beeps, followed by 2 beeps
pairing.PAIRING_LOCKBOX_STEP_1: Twist the battery cover clockwise to open it.
pairing.PAIRING_LOCKBOX_STEP_2: Use a sharp object to press the reset button which falls between the 3rd and 4th battery slots. Hold it for 2 seconds.
pairing.PAIRING_BOLT2_NON_FACTORY_STEP_1: Locate the reset button in the top right hole of the back panel of the front assembly of the lock.
pairing.PAIRING_BOLT2_NON_FACTORY_STEP_2: Trigger the reset button using a thin object and hold it for 20 seconds.
pairing.PAIRING_BOLT2_NON_FACTORY_STEP_3: If you need further support, please visit igloohome Help Center in Support Page.
pairing.PAIRING_MORTISE_NON_FACTORY_STEP_1: Locate the reset button located at the bottom right of the battery compartment.
pairing.PAIRING_MORTISE_NON_FACTORY_STEP_2: Press the reset button together with the hash key on the keypad until you hear beep sound.
pairing.PAIRING_KEYBOX_2_STEP_1: Open the Keybox 2 and unscrew the battery cover.
pairing.PAIRING_KEYBOX_2_STEP_2: Use a sharp object to press the reset button which falls between the 2nd and 3rd battery slots. Hold it for 2 seconds.
pairing.PAIRING_PADLOCK_RESET_STEP_1: Locate the reset button in the hole at the back after removing the battery cover.
pairing.PAIRING_PADLOCK_RESET_STEP_2: Trigger the reset button using a thin object and hold it for 3 seconds and you will hear a confirmation tone.
pairing.PAIRING_BOLT2S_IGB4_RESET_STEP_1: Hold on to [CLEAR] button and back body button that can be found below the thumbturn for 3 seconds and you will hear a confirmation tone.
pairing.PAIRING_MORTISE_IGM2_RESET_STEP_1: Hold on to [CLEAR] button and [R] button after removing the battery cover for 3 seconds and you will hear a confirmation tone.

errors.There are no bluetooth devices detected: There are no bluetooth devices detected in your network.
errors.Try to turn bluetooth off and then on ag: Try to turn bluetooth off and then on again.
errors.We are unable to connect to the device s: We are unable to connect to the device selected.
errors.The lock that you are trying to add has: The lock that you are trying to add has already been claimed by another user.
errors.Please get the previous owner to delete: Please get the previous owner to delete the lock. The delete lock option can be found under lock settings.
errors.If you believe this to be in error, plea: If you believe this to be in error, please visit igloohome Help Center in Support Page
errors.NOT_IGLOOHOME: This is not an igloohome device and cannot be paired with igloohome app.
errors.Place palm over keypad to reactivate it: Place palm over keypad to reactivate it
errors.NETWORK_ERROR_MSG: We have encountered an error. Please check your network settings and try again.
errors.ENSURE_LOCK_ON: Please try again and ensure that the lights on the lock are lit.
errors.OWN_LOCK_ALREADY_PAIRED: This lock has already been paired to your account.
errors.UNABLE_TO_COMPLETE_PAIRING_ERROR: We encountered an error in the pairing process.
errors.The lock that you are trying to add has: The lock that you are trying to add has already been blocked.

tabs.Invalid Keys: All expired and used PIN codes
tabs.Pending Keys: All future duration PIN codes and pending bluetooth key that has not been claimed. Please click on 'Check Validity' to update the status of PIN codes

firmware.If there is an error during update, plea: If there is an error during update, please remove the batteries and put them back into the {{ecosystemType}}.

firmware.Please hold onto the settings button: Please hold onto the settings button if the blue light on your {{ecosystemType}} stops flashing.

LOCK_WITH_FOB: {{ecosystemType}} "{{name}}" was used to lock the lock.

UNLOCK_VIA_KEY_OR_THUMBTURN: You have Unlocked via physical key or thumb turn.

add_card_error: Added key card may not be shown in app. Please retry.
unlock_error: Unable to connect to the lock. Please ensure that the keypad is awake and try again. If Bluetooth is â€œOnâ€, please restart your Bluetooth.
update mastercode error: Unable to connect to Lock. Please ensure that the keypad is awake and try again. If Bluetooth is â€œOnâ€, please restart your Bluetooth.
delete lock error: Unable to remove the lock. Please ensure that you are within bluetooth range of the lock and try again.
sync lock error: Unable to sync the lock. Please ensure that you are within bluetooth range of the lock and try again.
sync lock bt in progress error: Unable to sync the lock. Please try again.
location_permission error: Please ensure that the Bluetooth and location are turned on, Bluetooth privacy is enabled, then try again.
use pin before: Please use the PIN code once before proceeding.
edit pincode error: Unable to connect to Lock. Please ensure that the keypad is awake and try again. If Bluetooth is â€œOnâ€, please restart your Bluetooth.
network_error: Please check your network settings and try again.
pin creation limit reached error: PIN generation limit reached for this hour. Please wait till the next hour to generate more remotely. Alternatively, you may create PIN codes via Bluetooth.
key card creation limit reached error: Keycard creation limit reached. No further keycards can be added.
legacy pin creation limit reached error: PIN creation limit reached. Please delete all PINs to create more.

Update PIN Send Time Message2: Access message for {{guestName}} (containing access methods such as PIN codes and/or bluetooth keys) will be sent {{sendAccessEmail}} hour(s) before check in time.
You are making changes to the default li: You are making changes to the default listing settings.
Please note that this will not take effe: Please note that this will not take effect on modified reservations.

Reservation Share Msg2:
Hi {{guestName}}, 

Here is your igloohome self check-in details at {{listingName}} from {{startDate}} to {{endDate}}.

{{access_pin_list}} Your PIN is valid only from check-in to check-out time. Please use within 24 hours from your check-in time to activate the PIN.

If you experience any issues, please contact your host.

Enjoy your stay!
The igloohome Team
